PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides , the device performance generally varied with the length of alkyl side chains attached onto the polymer backbone.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the length of alkyl side chains |
| onto the polymer backbone |

The entities mentioned as "the length of alkyl side chains" and "onto the polymer backbone" are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph. These entities describe the attribute or characteristic of the device performance that varies.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the length of alkyl side chains |

The only valid "Property Value" entity in the paragraph is "the length of alkyl side chains" as it refers to the value of a material property. The other entity "onto the polymer backbone" describes the location or position of the alkyl side chains, and not the value of a material property.
